name: What If? 2!
description:
This is a short game that I created using the Twine game engine. All writing credits go to Randall Munroe, the creator of xkcd and the writer of the book "What If? 2!". This was created just to learn how to use Twine and see what I could do with it, I have no intentions of profiting off of this small project.

License for non-commercial use: xkcd - A Webcomic - License

There is no way to win in this "game", as there is no goal or end screen to reach. The goal of this "game" is simply just to play through and appreciate the creative ideas and writing of Randall Munroe.

I want to tell people false things about eggs today. Now what about you? Comment below what you get :)

Here is the full flowchart, only click if you want spoilers: https://xkcd.com/2672
